title: Its been 3 years, any chance i could...
body:
Its been approximately 3 years since i've been banned and i was wondering if there was any chance i could get my account unbanned, i recently have been thinking of playing the game again but don't want to make a new account, is their anything i could do to prove that in the time i was banned i have been reformed, 

Thank you for your time.

replies.body:
That's not the case at all. Tyler1 had an ID ban which was lifted, but none of this accounts were ever given back to him. OP has exactly the same rights as Tyler1: He may make a new account any time he wishes.

I mean, I personally hate that Riot works with Tyler1 now, but it's still been a consistent treatment. Not sure who else you're referring to, since that's the only specific name you used.

I'm afraid that at this time Riot does not unban accounts that were correctly banned, no matter how much time has elapsed. Unless this policy changes (and we have no indication that we should expect a change at this time), the account will not be recoverable.
I mean, nothing's stopping you from making a support ticket, but... it was a permanent ban, not a three-year suspension. Don't get your hopes up.
I mean... three years is quite a long time of reforming... I would agree with that if nothing else happens.

Hahahahahahahahahaha

no
Heeeeeeeell no.
Absolutely no.

You got banned, you stay banned.
So .... no.

{{sticker:vlad-salute}}
